sentences.sentence: Ah, welcome, my child. It is always a pleasure to converse with a curious mind such as yours.
During the week, my duties often keep me away in the mornings, afternoons, and even around midday.
There are always parishioners in need of guidance, or matters requiring my attention outside these walls.
If you need to find me, Saturday is the best day. I remain here all day, attending to the community.
Sundays, of course, are for the Lordâ€™s work. In the morning, I am at the church for mass.
If you ever wish to discuss something outside these hours, let me know. I will do my best to make time.
